info.name: Telegram messenger Dark
info.description:
for telegram web
*first enable dark mode inside settings in telegram web
*use background black for this theme (recommended)
remember that there are 2 or 3 different letters at the end of each url, this theme only works on
(web.telegram.org/z/)
info.additionalInfo:
*don't ask for quick updates ever
*this work is mine and I don't know anything about creating web pages, or design, I just use my
 head a little
*if there is a style available just use it
*I create all styles just for myself,but the page requires me to share my work,
 so if you don't like it just don't use it,but if you like it use it and enjoy it,

*chat online
https://t.me/+YR7pzZbb6q0yZGVh
